summary: This document is an email chain from April 3, 2019, in which an FBI agent forwards a personal email received from a victim of Jeffrey Epstein. The victim, who was abused by Epstein and his co-conspirators, reaches out to the agent, recalling their meeting in Australia and expressing hope for continued action to bring Epstein to justice.

persons.name: Jason Richards
persons.role: Person present during meeting with victim and FBI agent
persons.context: Mentioned by the victim as being present during a meeting in Australia where they discussed the Epstein matter and the abuse she suffered.

connections.description: The victim states she was abused by Jeffrey Epstein.
The victim states she was also abused by Epstein's other co-conspirators.
The victim had previously met with the FBI agent in Australia to discuss the abuse and feels the agent cared deeply about the failure of justice.

events.title: Victim reaches out to FBI agent
events.description: A victim of Jeffrey Epstein sends a personal email to an FBI agent, providing an update on her efforts to have her voice heard and seeking to discuss the ongoing Epstein matter.

events.title: Meeting in Australia
events.description: The victim and Jason Richards met with an FBI agent in Australia to discuss the Epstein matter and the abuse she suffered.

keyFacts: A victim of Jeffrey Epstein directly contacted an FBI agent via personal email in April 2019.
The victim states she was abused by both Jeffrey Epstein and his other co-conspirators.
The victim had previously met with the FBI agent and Jason Richards in Australia to discuss the case.
The victim expresses that the FBI agent made her feel heard and cared about the failure of justice in the Epstein case.
The correspondence indicates ongoing victim outreach and efforts to advance the case against Epstein and his associates.
